revised_title: Kew Observatory Annual Report for 1873: Magnetic and Meteorological Work
tldr: The Kew Committee's annual report for 1873 discusses the management of the observatory, magnetic work, meteorological observations, and instrument verification. The report highlights the continuation of automatic records of magnetographs, the examination and readjustment of magnetic instruments, and the testing of anemometers. The observatory also provided meteorological data to various institutions and assisted in verifying instruments for other observatories.
